QuestData.Title: The Trainer's Challenge: Ningna Darkwheel
QuestData.Description: You show much promise, $n. However, talent is worth little without discipline and humility.$B$BToday, you will face Ningna Darkwheel. Her natural strength makes her one of our most talented students. $B$BIf you hope to defeat her, you will need to act with the utmost control.$B$BSpeak to her in the training ring to begin the challenge. Good luck.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Ningna Darkwheel, then defeat her.
